name: Obelisk Support
tagline: Legal Work That Works for You
description: Obelisk Support pools together extremely able ex-City lawyers to provide high quality, adaptable and affordable legal support to law firms and in-house teams globally. Lawyers can be placed with clients on an interim basis, or can work remotely for the client, either on stand-by or as backup legal advisers. The business is also a provider of multi-lingual lawyer-led linguistic services supporting our clients' legal translation and foreign document review requirements.
